name: Reflected
description:
"Reflected" is basically a platformer game, except there's a mirror. You have to touch the green platform with the 2 squares without anyone of them falling down. This game was made for the Mirror Game Jam. If you have feedback or any questions don't hesitate to post a comment!

Controls:

  • P: Pause
  • Jump: Space bar
  • Move: WD or Arrow keys

Platforms:

  • Windows (Tested)
  • Web (Tested)
